content.text: I love reading. It's my favorite way to relax and clear my head.
Reading is great! I'm proud of the beautiful things I create with my hands.
That's awesome! What kinds of things do you make?
I crochet a lot. I also make jewelry and other crafts.
That's so cool! I'm not very crafty, but I admire people who are.
Thanks! It's a lot of fun, and it's really rewarding to see something you've created come to life.
I can imagine! Do you sell your crafts?
I do, a little bit. I mostly just give them away as gifts.
That's so nice of you! I'm sure your friends and family appreciate them.
They do! I love making people happy.
That's a great quality to have.
Thanks! I try to be a good person.
